alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 8:02AM EST until February 08 at 4:37PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Ohio and Muhlenberg Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 17.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM CST Monday was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 13.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.0 feet on 03/22/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon.
